name: SnipeMe Front and Center
description: Centers the SnipeMe website and forum for larger displays
additional_info: SnipeMe.com's fluid layout doesn't look as good on larger displays. So, I created a simple userstyle to transform it into an elastic layout. This means that the page is fitted to a minimum and maximum width, and if the browser's window size goes beyond the maximum, the content is centered on the page. Tested on 800x600, 1024x768, 1280x720, 1440x900, 1920x1200.
